public class FileNode

FileNode: implementation of TreeNode, used in FileSystem.

preString

public java.lang.String preString()
Output methods used as part of the display methods of the Tree.

preString() generates a string of the node to be displayed *before* traversal of children, postString() generates a string of the node to be displayed *after* traversal of children.

Specified by:
preString in interface TreeNode
